attributes.action: overrule the decision by banks and building societies to consider charge fees on accounts.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: They have the pleasure of using our money and now they want to charge us for it.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/refundcharges/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
